about_the_game:
Do you love minigames? Looking to play online with friends with no limits?

Meet Super Party Games Online, and find a varied choice of minigames for a fun-filled online party gaming experience with your friends. With the ability to play with up to 3 friends, our online minigames are the perfect way to bring your social gatherings to life!

No friends around? No problem! You can also play with others from around the world!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER PARTY MINIGAMES

From neon parties to survival runs, you’ll find a wide variety of party games to play with friends, locally or online. Dodge ninja attacks, catch ghosts, jump on a pogo stick, and so much more!

ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION
🧑‍🎨Customize your avatar and show the world how cool you are! You can obtain dozens of customization items by playing our multiplayer minigames. Have fun crafting your player’s looks!

MANY WAYS TO PLAY!
🎉You can set up a party with friends to play Rumble mode, go on an Adventure playing on a board, or play quick matches choosing your favorite minigames!

QUESTS AND RANKINGS
🏆Complete quests to earn extra in-game currency and purchase items in the shop. Compete for your place on the global Trophies and Crowns rankings!

SUPER PARTY GAMES ONLINE FEATURES:

· Playing with up to 3 friends
· Online multiplayer
· Endless customization possibilities
· Tons of party games
· 1 2 3 4 player minigames
· Upbeat soundtrack
· Spinning the wheel for daily rewards
· Regular updates with improvements and new minigames!
· All of this for free!

Enjoy the classic superstar party games with elements of board games and fun minigames! Experience the most fun and competitive party game experience on PC!

name: Super Party Games Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750 | NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

Meet Super Party Games Online, and find a varied choice of minigames for a fun-filled online party gaming experience with your friends. With the ability to play with up to 3 friends to bring your social gatherings to life!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
